title: A Full Recap of the Own Your Everyday Book Tour with Matt Dooley
description:
Wonder what it's really like to launch a book? Travel to 9 cities in 10 days? In this episode, Jordan and Matt are sharing their favorite moments and funniest stories from the Own Your Everyday book tour. Tune in to learn what really goes into a book tour, Matt's top food recommendations in each city, and all that comes with hopping time zones day after day.

Get the book here: jordanleedooley.com/book

Get your book tour tickets here: https://jordanleedooley.com/oye-tour

Say hi on social!

Instagram

Facebook
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
